from azsc.handlers.az.Generic import GenericHandler

class ResourceGroupHandler(GenericHandler):
    azure_object = "group"
 
    def execute(self):
        self.add_context_parameter("location", "location")

        self.save_to_context()

output.after:
from azsc.handlers.Handler import Handler
from azsc.handlers.az.Generic import GenericHandler

class ResourceGroupHandler(GenericHandler):
    azure_object = "group"
 
    def execute(self):
        self.add_context_parameter("location", "location")

        cmd = super(ResourceGroupHandler, self).execute()

        self.save_to_context()

        return cmd
 
  
    def set_up_handler(self):
        super(ResourceGroupHandler, self).set_up_handler()

        self.handler = ResourceGroupHandler()
        self.handler.set_up_handler()
